* Desmonus looked through the trees and out into the battlefield, watching 
her prays every move.
This one was big, bigger then she had ever seen in a while, but equally 
injured.
It was that silver transmetal 2s' mech-fluid that she was inturested in, but 
he looked almost as if he was to big for her to handle.
She just might be forced to wait until he was in stasis lock before she fed 
upon him, when he wouldn't give her any troubles.
Desmonus crept a little closer before she stopped short, suddenly seeing a 
great dragon come up right beside her intended meal.( Necromancer.)
She hissed and slipped into the shadows, watching...and waiting.*
